page.title: 16Changing times,1945-1985.
page.content: In 1945 there were 350 people.In 1950 Salcey Avenue was built.In 1967 Church Close was built.In 1972 Bryant Houses were built.In 1961 the new school was built and was enlarged in 1970.Number of people in 1970,1500.1975 Grafton Close was built.1985 population,2500. Jobs in Hartwell,1945 mostly forestry, farming,woodyard,sawmill,coalyard.Now by 1950 most jobs were out of the village.New people from towns & Cities had to change to village life.Some farmland was lost for housing,but the forest has not changed.There were two shops in Hartwell until December 1984. Now there is only one.Farming was mixed but is now mostly cereals.Some are changing to potatoes or sheep or beef. New people have brought new ideas like the Playgroup scheme. Jon-Paul Abrahams,11 years.
